availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Willis Daniel (Covington, Kenton County, Kentucky, master carpenter)

body.p: Covington, Kenton County, Kentucky, carpenter. Kentucky native. Married to Maria Daniel. Father of Willis Daniel and Edwin Daniel. Master carpenter in Covington, Kentucky in 1860. Juror in trial of the Commonwealth of Kentucky V. Daniel W. Clark in January 1861.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, p. 886. KYR-0001-021-0014.
